title: Create Network Policy Allow Specific Pod
description: Create a NetworkPolicy named ||allow-frontend|| in Namespace ||production|| that allows ingress traffic from pods with label ||app=frontend|| to pods with label ||app=backend|| on port ||8080||.

steps: 1. Create NetworkPolicy YAML with podSelector for app=backend
2. Add ingress rule allowing from pods with app=frontend on port 8080

validations.description: NetworkPolicy should allow from frontend pods
